attributes.additional_details: Let us british people have the right to have our husbands or wives come from a non EU country to the UK to join family. Most of the people do not meet the requirements and with few jobs and min wage it's doesn't help those whom have no money or are deprived of a mother or father because they are in another country . We have Human rights and freedom rights . Why can EU nationals come but genuine people can't have their family without having certain tests. Lower the requirements , there are people torn between two worlds , people that didn't chose to fall in love with a foreigner it happened it's no ones fault . Give us the choice , give us the chance to be a family .
